Section 1: Accuracy with Guidance
Supervised learning leverages labeled datasets so models can compare
predictions against known answers during training. This guidance often
leads to faster convergence and higher accuracy than unsupervised
approaches.
Section 2: Auditability and Compliance
Because each training example has a label, organizations can trace why
a prediction was made. This transparency supports audits and regulatory
reviews.
